title: Extract shared Pagination struct to common DTOs module
description:
Multiple identical Pagination structs are defined across handler files:
- backend/src/api/handlers/users.rs
- backend/src/api/handlers/repositories.rs
- backend/src/api/handlers/packages.rs
- backend/src/api/handlers/permissions.rs
- backend/src/api/handlers/groups.rs
- backend/src/api/handlers/builds.rs

Each defines the same struct:
```rust
pub struct Pagination {
    pub page: u32,
    pub per_page: u32,
    pub total: i64,
    pub total_pages: u32,
}
```

**Task:** Create a shared DTOs module (e.g., backend/src/api/dto/mod.rs) and consolidate:
1. The Pagination struct
2. Common list query parameter structs (ListQuery with page/per_page)
3. Update all handler files to import from the shared module

This reduces duplication and ensures consistency across the API.
close_reason: Completed: Created shared DTO module at backend/src/api/dto.rs with Pagination and PaginationQuery structs. Refactored 6 handler files to use shared module. All tests pass.
